comments.body:
Why remove the newlines here? It is usually easer to read if it is broken up, and forces it to jump out when this is the error.

I'm not 100% against the change, just curious about the reasoning to change it.

It is just friendly for log collectors which are sensitive to newline. :)
 
Single-line error message may be easy for being collected with log prefix (level, time, file and line number, etc.).  
Multi-line one might lose prefix which contains that info. When these lines are sent to remote log db and parsed to structured data, It is sometimes hard to search and locate.
